title: Sound On: U.S. Exits Afghanistan After 20 Years
itunes:title: Sound On: U.S. Exits Afghanistan After 20 Years
description:
Guests: Craig Gordon, Bloomberg Washington Bureau Chief, Retired Brigadier General Mark Kimmitt, former Deputy Assistant Secretary of Defense for Middle East Affairs, Congressman John Garamendi, and Bloomberg Politics Contributors, Rick Davis and Jeanne Sheehan Zaino.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
